title.en: The Beautiful Garland of Uḍumbara Flowers

text.en: Oṃ svasti!
text.en-trans: om svasti

text.en: Wisdom embodiment of all the buddhas and their bodhisattva heirs,
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé dang chepé yeshe ku

text.en: Sovereign ruler present throughout the whole of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü mu tamepar khyabpé dak

text.en: Spontaneously arisen primal buddha, transcendent conqueror,
text.en-trans: rangjung dangpö sangye chomdendé

text.en: Lord and protector Mañjughoṣa, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gönpo jampé yang la solwa deb

text.en: Powerful master of wisdom, Mañjuśrīmitra,
text.en-trans: khyen rab wangchuk jampal shenyen dang

text.en: Vimalamitra, who gained an indestructible vajra form,
text.en-trans: dorjé ku nyé bimalamitra

text.en: Cakrasaṃvara in person, Vajraghaṇṭāpāda,
text.en-trans: khorlo dom ngö dorjé drilbu pa

text.en: And the great paṇḍita Anantamukhamati,1to you I pray!
text.en-trans: panchen go tayepar solwa deb

text.en: Dharma-king Tsangpa Lhayi Metok,
text.en-trans: chögyal tsangpa lha yi metok dang

text.en: And the reincarnation Chokdrub Gyalpo,2
text.en-trans: dé yi yangtrul chok drub gyalpö zhab

text.en: Smṛtijñāna,3Nyangtön Nyima Özer,4
text.en-trans: smritijnana nyang tön nyima ö

text.en: And Chögyal Phakpa,5to you I pray!
text.en-trans: chögyal pakpa nam la solwa deb

text.en: Crowning jewel of siddhas, Milarepa,
text.en-trans: drubpé tsukgyen mi la repa dang

text.en: Drikung Rinchen Pal,6Drimé Özer,7
text.en-trans: drigung rinchen pal dang drimé ö

text.en: Medicine Buddha incarnate, Yuthok Yönten Gönpo,8
text.en-trans: men la ngö nang yu tok yönten gön

text.en: And Sonam Gyaltsen,9to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sönam gyaltsen nam la solwa deb

text.en: Vanaratna,10Gö Lotsawa Shyönnu Pal,11
text.en-trans: nak kyi rinchen gö lo zhönnu pal

text.en: Khyenrab Chöjé,12great paṇḍita Gendun Drup,13
text.en-trans: khyen rab chöjé panchen gendün drub

text.en: Lord of siddhas, Thangtong Gyalpo,14
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk tangtong gyalpo dang

text.en: And Könchok Gyaltsen,15to you I pray!
text.en-trans: könchok gyaltsen nam la solwa deb

text.en: Sakya Lotsawa Jamyang Kunga Sonam,16
text.en-trans: sa lo jamyang künga sönam dang

text.en: Ngari Paṇchen,17Nesar Khyentse Wangchuk,18
text.en-trans: ngari panchen né sar khyentsé wang

text.en: Tashi Tobgyal,19Lobzang Gyatsöi De,20
text.en-trans: tashi tob gyal lo zang gyatsö dé

text.en: And Gyalwa Tsangyang,21to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gyalwa tsang yang zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Great omniscient one in this troubled age, Jikmé Lingpa,
text.en-trans: tsödü künkhyen chenpo jikmé ling

text.en: Lord of siddhas, Yeshe Dorje,22no different from
text.en-trans: drubpé wangchuk yeshe dorjé dang

text.en: Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo, recipient of the seven special transmissions,23
text.en-trans: yermé kabab dünden khyentsé wang

text.en: And Jamyang Lodrö Gyatso,24to you I pray!
text.en-trans: jamyang lodrö gyatsor solwa deb

text.en: In this life and in future, until I attain enlightenment,
text.en-trans: kyewa di zung changchub matob bar

text.en: May I never be separated from you, my precious master,
text.en-trans: jetsün lama khyé dang midral zhing

text.en: May I always experience the nectar of your instructions, your secret speech,
text.en-trans: sung sang dampé dütsir chöpa dang

text.en: And may my own and others’ welfare be accomplished spontaneously!
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drubpar shok
